version_description: Add analytics to the app.
Add analytics to the app.

Updates on MyVIB:
- Make online payments for free on MyVIB from 01 Sep 2016

Updates on MyVIB:
- Make online payments for free on MyVIB from 01 Sep 2016

Experience our new advanced features specially designed for you: MyVIB Goalsaver & Multiple bill payment:
- MyVIB Goalsaver is designed to help you achieving your goals, planning for your future with attractive interest rate.
- Multiple bill payment enable you to select multiple bills and make payment at once. In addition to this, there is also Auto Bill notification that helping you not forgetting to pay your bills no more.

Experience our new advanced features specially designed for you: MyVIB Goalsaver & Multiple bill payment:
- MyVIB Goalsaver is designed to help you achieving your goals, planning for your future with attractive interest rate.
- Multiple bill payment enable you to select multiple bills and make payment at once. In addition to this, there is also Auto Bill notification that helping you not forgetting to pay your bills no more.
This version contains small enhancements to existing features and bugs fixing.
This version contains small enhancements to existing features and bugs fixing.

· Improvements to Inbox and Card promotion search in look and feel and functionalities helping you access to promotion and other information easily
· Some other small enhancements to existing features making your banking with MyVIB more conveniently.

· Improvements to Inbox and Card promotion search in look and feel and functionalities helping you access to promotion and other information easily
· Some other small enhancements to existing features making your banking with MyVIB more conveniently.

- The new version of MyVIB introducing My Card feature allowing users to manage Cards' details more easily within the app.
- Some other small enhancements to existing features making your banking with MyVIB more conveniently.

- The new version of MyVIB introducing My Card feature allowing users to manage Cards' details more easily within the app.
- Some other small enhancements to existing features making your banking with MyVIB more conveniently.
- The new version of MyVIB contains some small enhancements to existing features making your banking with MyVIB more conveniently.
- The new version of MyVIB contains some small enhancements to existing features making your banking with MyVIB more conveniently.

New features to update:
- Consolidated accounts (Money manager): Proactively manage your money in and money out of last 03 months
- Convenient account address book: Update your account address book right away on MyVIB

New features to update:
- Consolidated accounts (Money manager): Proactively manage your money in and money out of last 03 months
- Convenient account address book: Update your account address book right away on MyVIB

Update new features:
- PIN card issuance: Proactively change and set PIN right on MyVIB without visiting the branches
- Maintain monthly credit card e-statement: Easily manage and check your credit card monthly statement and send it to your email any time as you wish

Update new features:
- PIN card issuance: Proactively change and set PIN right on MyVIB without visiting the branches
- Maintain monthly credit card e-statement: Easily manage and check your credit card monthly statement and send it to your email any time as you wish
Airlines tickets Gotadi – Airlines tickets booking and payment with MyVIB
Airlines tickets Gotadi – Airlines tickets booking and payment with MyVIB

New features to update:

- Easily top-up to varied e-Wallet providers such as: VTC, Payoo
- Expand more providers to supply billing and top-up services: Water (Hai Phong, Ha Noi), Cable TV (K+, An Vien, VTC, VTVCab)
- Other enhancement and bugs fixing

New features to update:

- Easily top-up to varied e-Wallet providers such as: VTC, Payoo
- Expand more providers to supply billing and top-up services: Water (Hai Phong, Ha Noi), Cable TV (K+, An Vien, VTC, VTVCab)
- Other enhancement and bugs fixing
This version contains small enhancements to existing features and bugs fixing.
This version contains small enhancements to existing features and bugs fixing.

New features to update:

- Easily top-up to varied e-Wallet providers such as: Momo, VTC, Payoo
- Expand more providers to supply billing services: Prudential Insurance fee
- Implement new promotional campaign “Golden Hour – Travelling around Vietnam with MyVIB”
- Other enhancement and bugs fixing

New features to update:

- Easily top-up to varied e-Wallet providers such as: Momo, VTC, Payoo
- Expand more providers to supply billing services: Prudential Insurance fee
- Implement new promotional campaign “Golden Hour – Travelling around Vietnam with MyVIB”
- Other enhancement and bugs fixing

Find out much more new functionalities:
- Cash advance from VIB Credit Card: Enjoy cash advance from VIB Credit Card and feel free to pay online anytime, anywhere
- Payment via QR Code: Fast and convenient payment via QR Code
- Biometric login: Explore a newly simple and secure way of login MyVIB via biometrics

- Small bugs fixing for iOS 9

- Security enhancement
- Small bugs fixing for iOS 9

Find out much more new functionalities:
- Active to change e-banking password
- Convenient to top-up to any AirPay e-wallet
- Simple and easy to book an international flight
- Other small enhancements

Find out much more new functionalities:
- Active to change e-banking password
- Convenient to top-up to any AirPay e-wallet
- Simple and easy to book an international flight

Small enhancements and bug fixings:

1. Add more QR Code type to purchase online
2. Enable more billing providers to pay: Water (Da Nang, Vung Tau, Long Khanh, Dong Nai), Insurance (PTI),...
3. Other enhancements

Small enhancements and bug fixings:

1. Add more QR Code type to purchase online
2. Enable more billing providers to pay: Water (Da Nang, Vung Tau, Long Khanh, Dong Nai), Insurance (PTI),...
3. Other enhancements

New functionalities:

- Online hotel booking in any destination now is easy, convenient and best prices with MyVIB
- Other small bug fixings and enhancement

New functionalities:

- Online hotel booking in any destination now is easy, convenient and best prices with MyVIB
- Other small bug fixings and enhancement

Find out much more new functionalities:

- MyVIB Smart OTP: Smart mobile software authentication with capability to define high-value transaction and generate relevant OTP
- Online term deposit: Opportunity to enjoy “Double reward with VIB deposit account” promotion campaign and get double interest rate upon opening new online term deposit

Find out much more new functionalities:

- MyVIB Smart OTP: Smart mobile software authentication with capability to define high-value transaction and generate relevant OTP
- Online term deposit: Opportunity to enjoy “Double reward with VIB deposit account” promotion campaign and get double interest rate upon opening new online term deposit

Find out much more new functionalities:
· VnDirect Securities Transfer: Directly connect with VnDirect Securities and provide customers with utmost convenient, easy and fast service
· Card Installment Enrollment: Proactively enroll in installment payment plan as for transaction made via VIB Credit Card

New features to update:
- Upgrade existing credit card features and launch brand-new VIB Happy Drive product.
- Earn points for every spending transaction via VIB Credit Card and enjoy reward points agreement which allows customers to redeem cash and other rewards via MyVIB.

New features to update:
- Upgrade existing credit card features and launch brand-new VIB Happy Drive product.
- Earn points for every spending transaction via VIB Credit Card and enjoy reward points agreement which allows customers to redeem cash and other rewards via MyVIB.

- Enhance Lucky money functionality
- Small bugs fixing

- Enhance Lucky money functionality
- Small bugs fixing

- VIB virtual card: Allow customers to activate and make online transaction via MyVIB application before physical card is delivered.
- Card notification: Any important updates/changes on VIB credit card will be immediately notified to customers via push notification/SMS/email.
- Small bug fixing and enhancement.

- VIB virtual card: Allow customers to activate and make online transaction via MyVIB application before physical card is delivered.
- Card notification: Any important updates/changes on VIB credit card will be immediately notified to customers via push notification/SMS/email.
- Small bug fixing and enhancement.

• Update new feature: e-Gifts – Provide customer outstanding gifting experience.
• Some minor upgrades and modifications.

• Update new feature: e-Gifts – Provide customer outstanding gifting experience.
• Some minor upgrades and modifications.

New features to update:

• Promotion campaign: E-Vouchers to reward limited customers experiencing new functionality “E-Gifts” via MyVIB
• Installment by balance: Enable customers using VIB Credit Card to enroll in installment by balance
• VIB Zero Card – 0% interest rate: Allow customers to activate, view information and pay off outstanding balance via MyVIB
• Small bug fixing and enhancement

New features to update:

• Promotion campaign: E-Vouchers to reward limited customers experiencing new functionality “E-Gifts” via MyVIB
• Installment by balance: Enable customers using VIB Credit Card to enroll in installment by balance
• VIB Zero Card – 0% interest rate: Allow customers to activate, view information and pay off outstanding balance via MyVIB
• Small bug fixing and enhancement

New features to update:

• Allow users to file a claim for a online transaction on MyVIB. Receive real-time claim result, or within 01-03 working days.
• Small bug fixes and UI improvements.

New features to update:

• Allow users to file a claim for a online transaction on MyVIB. Receive real-time claim result, or within 01-03 working days.
• Small bug fixes and UI improvements.

New features to update:

• View and pay Prudential Insurance Premium fees online.
• View loan details, scheduled repayments and repayment history.
• Small bug fixes and enhancements.

New features to update:

• View and pay Prudential Insurance Premium fees online.
• View loan details, scheduled repayments and repayment history.

- Launching promotion campaign “MyVIB – Tab more, Chill more” with thousands of eVouchers rewarded for first-time-login customers and re-active customers.
- Enable customers who own VIB car loan to request car receipt.
- Some small enhancement and bug fixings.

- Launching promotion campaign “MyVIB – Tab more, Chill more” with thousands of eVouchers rewarded for first-time-login customers and re-active customers.
- Enable customers who own VIB car loan to request car receipt.
- Some small enhancement and bug fixings.

- Launching promotion campaign “MyVIB – Tab more, Chill more” with thousands of eVouchers rewarded for first-time-login customers and re-active customers.
- Enable customers who own VIB car loan to request car receipt.
- Some small enhancement and bug fixings.

- Launching promotion campaign “MyVIB – Tab more, Chill more” with thousands of eVouchers rewarded for first-time-login customers and re-active customers.
- Enable customers who own VIB car loan to request car receipt.
- Some small enhancement and bug fixings.

- Ra mắt giải pháp định danh trực tuyến: Xác thực thông tin, đăng ký dịch vụ MyVIB siêu tốc trong vòng 1 phút và được cấp phép giao dịch ngay lập tức.
- Một số chỉnh sửa và nâng cấp nhỏ.

- Ra mắt giải pháp định danh trực tuyến: Xác thực thông tin, đăng ký dịch vụ MyVIB siêu tốc trong vòng 1 phút và được cấp phép giao dịch ngay lập tức.
- Một số chỉnh sửa và nâng cấp nhỏ.

- Áp dụng công nghệ định danh điện tử e-KYC cho khách hàng mới mở tài khoản thanh toán trên ứng dụng MyVIB. Hạn mức giao dịch tối đa trên tài khoản lên tới 100 triệu đồng
- Ra mắt gói sản phẩm bảo hiểm sức khỏe trực tuyến VIBCare. Khách hàng có thể chủ động mở hợp đồng bảo hiểm và nhận hợp đồng ngay.

- Ra mắt tài khoản thanh toán Digi được thiết kế chuyên biệt cho trải nghiệm số nhanh hơn, mượt hơn, với nhiều lợi ích hơn bao giờ hết.

・Ra mắt MyVIB Rewards – tài khoản tích lũy xu thưởng cho giao dịch trực tuyến.
・Ra mắt chương trình quay thưởng “MyVIB – Dùng miễn phí, trúng tiền tỷ, rinh iPhone như ý”.
・Nâng cấp tính năng hoàn tiền – lên tới 20% khi nạp tiền điện thoại, dành cho khách hàng mở tài khoản Digi.

- Yêu cầu phát hành thẻ vật lý iCard: Khách hàng có thể chủ động lựa chọn màu in thẻ và yêu cầu cấp thẻ vật lý. Thẻ sẽ được giao tận tay bạn trong vòng tối đa 7 ngày làm việc.
- Đăng ký thẻ tín dụng trực tuyến: Trải nghiệm mở thẻ tín dụng một cách nhanh, gọn, tiện lợi bằng cách đăng ký trực tuyến và nhận phê duyệt cấp thẻ trong vòng 60 phút.
- Sửa lỗi, nâng cấp nhỏ.

・Chuyển tiền chứng khoán HSC: Mang đến sự tiện lợi cho nhà đầu tư trong việc chuyển tiền vào tài khoản chứng khoán.
・Đổi điểm GrabRewards: Dùng điểm tích lũy của thẻ quy đổi điểm thưởng với kho quà tặng phong phú từ Grab.
・Quay Là Trúng - Mỗi tuần eGift Tiki 10 triệu đồng và 99.999 eGifts hấp dẫn.
・Sửa lỗi, nâng cấp nhỏ.
